name: Playbook for Phishing Attack Mitigation
description: This playbook addresses the incident of an attacker gaining access through phishing and executing malicious PowerShell scripts.

action--e6bc48e2-cf9b-4b4d-97ea-0d748ef5.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--e6bc48e2-cf9b-4b4d-97ea-0d748ef5.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing malicious scripts.

action--f1664d1f-df34-4a13-9e2f-10007e9d.name: Run malware scan
action--f1664d1f-df34-4a13-9e2f-10007e9d.description: Perform a malware scan on the victim's files until no threats are detected.

scan_result.description: Determines if the scan is clean.

action--dfee3e73-e43e-4528-8d69-9b9edcb6.name: Block outbound connections
action--dfee3e73-e43e-4528-8d69-9b9edcb6.description: Block all outbound connections to known malicious IPs.

connection_established.description: Check if connection is established to known malicious IP.

action--a079ca25-e675-4834-9514-7331d6cf.name: Check for persistence mechanisms
action--a079ca25-e675-4834-9514-7331d6cf.description: Identify and remove any persistence mechanisms related to the incident.

action--d208708b-47ff-429d-8366-6c0d2613.name: Update incident response plan
action--d208708b-47ff-429d-8366-6c0d2613.description: Document new phishing tactics observed in the incident log.

commands.command: echo 'Update: New phishing tactics observed' >> incident_log.txt

loop--cacccaf9-8575-4c89-90a3-e8abf21def.name: Check if malware scan is clean
loop--cacccaf9-8575-4c89-90a3-e8abf21def.description: Repeat malware scan until the scan result is clean.

if-condition--34d350b2-b265-485a-ac57-eb.name: Check if connection to malicious IP exists
